a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Neonatal, infant and child mortality rates, World, 1990 to 2020
Share of newborns who die in the first 28 days of life (neonatal mortality); first year of life (infant mortality) and before
reaching the age of five (child mortality).
Data source: UN Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (via World Bank)
